Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • BankAccount
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChequingAccount, SavingsAccount

    public abstract class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    BankAccount abstract class defines the parameters that are needed to create a bank account.
    Since:
    JDK 1.8
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Patrick Czermak

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Person accHolder
      protected Person variable accHolder has predefined parameters in class Person (firstName, lastName, phoneNumber, emailAddress).
      protected int accountNumber
      protected variable accountNumber holds the account number of a Bank Account.
      protected double balance
      protected double variable balance holds an accounts balance.
      protected java.text.DecimalFormat decForm
      protected DecimalFormat variable decForm is used to format all number values for display within classes BankAccount, SavingsAccount, and ChequingAccount.
      protected java.util.Scanner input
      protected Scanner variable input is used to get user input from keyboard within classes BankAccount, SavingsAccount, and ChequingAccount.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankAccount()
      Default constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addBankAccount()
      Method addBankAccount adds the properly formatted information required for every account created, including account number, first name, last name, phone number, email address, and opening balance.
      abstract void monthlyAccountUpdate()
      Abstract method monthlyAccountUpdate utilizes the overridden subclasses monthlyAccountUpdate methods to update either a Savings or Chequing account.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Method toString returns data of the account formatted to display.
      void updateBalance(double amt)
      Method updateBalance updates the balance in the object by the parameter amount.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • accountNumber

        protected int accountNumber
        protected variable accountNumber holds the account number of a Bank Account. Must be a positive, unique number not greater than 8 numbers long.

      • accHolder

        protected Person accHolder
        protected Person variable accHolder has predefined parameters in class Person (firstName, lastName, phoneNumber, emailAddress).

      • balance

        protected double balance
        protected double variable balance holds an accounts balance. Must be a positive number.

      • input

        protected java.util.Scanner input
        protected Scanner variable input is used to get user input from keyboard within classes BankAccount, SavingsAccount, and ChequingAccount.

      • decForm

        protected java.text.DecimalFormat decForm
        protected DecimalFormat variable decForm is used to format all number values for display within classes BankAccount, SavingsAccount, and ChequingAccount.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BankAccount

        public BankAccount()
        Default constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method toString returns data of the account formatted to display. This method is overridden by its subclasses SavingsAccount and ChequingAccount. Combined they print the full required information of an account.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • addBankAccount

        public boolean addBankAccount()
        Method addBankAccount adds the properly formatted information required for every account created, including account number, first name, last name, phone number, email address, and opening balance.
        Returns:
        true while account holder information validates properly

      • updateBalance

        public void updateBalance(double amt)
        Method updateBalance updates the balance in the object by the parameter amount.
        Parameters:
        amt - holds the transaction amount

      • monthlyAccountUpdate

        public abstract void monthlyAccountUpdate()
        Abstract method monthlyAccountUpdate utilizes the overridden subclasses monthlyAccountUpdate methods to update either a Savings or Chequing account.
